walkthroughs.title: Halo CE Anniversary
walkthroughs.description: Humanity's last super-soldier fights an alien army and a parasitic threat on a mysterious ringworld.
walkthroughs.alt: A screenshot from Halo Combat Evolved Anniversary

walkthroughs.title: Halo 2 Anniversary
walkthroughs.description: Master Chief defends Earth while a disgraced alien, the Arbiter, uncovers a Covenant conspiracy.

walkthroughs.title: Halo 3
walkthroughs.description: Master Chief returns to Earth to finish the fight, stopping the Covenant and Flood once and for all.

walkthroughs.title: Halo 3 ODST
walkthroughs.description: A Helljumper awakens alone in New Mombasa, searching for his squad and uncovering a secret Covenant plot.

walkthroughs.title: Halo Reach
walkthroughs.description: As the Covenant invade humanity's last fortress, Noble Team makes a final stand to ensure Earth's survival.

walkthroughs.title: Halo 4
walkthroughs.description: After years adrift, Chief and Cortana crash on a Forerunner world, facing a new ancient foe and her AI rampancy.

walkthroughs.title: Halo Infinite
walkthroughs.description: On a damaged Halo ring, Master Chief faces the Banished, searching for Cortana and uncovering a new threat.

walkthroughs.title: Halo Wars
walkthroughs.description: UNSC soldiers on the Spirit of Fire fight the Covenant and discover a Flood-infested Forerunner shield world.

walkthroughs.title: Halo Wars 2
walkthroughs.description: The Spirit of Fire awakens 28 years later to find a new brutal alien faction, the Banished.

walkthroughs.title: Halo Wars 2: Operation Spearbreaker
walkthroughs.description: An ODST team, Sunray 1-1, drops in to stop a Banished plan to destroy the Spirit of Fire.
walkthroughs.alt: A screenshot from Halo Wars 2 Operation Spearbreaker

walkthroughs.title: Gears of War: Ultimate Edition
walkthroughs.description: Freed from prison, Marcus Fenix joins Delta Squad to detonate a bomb in the Locust tunnels.
walkthroughs.alt: A screenshot from Gears of War

walkthroughs.title: Goblin Commander: Unleash the Horde
walkthroughs.description: A wizard's death sparks a goblin civil war. Unite clans and discover the truth behind the plot.
walkthroughs.alt: A screenshot from Goblin Commander: Unleash the Horde

halo-wars-2.title: Halo Wars 2 Guides
halo-wars-2.description: Explore guides for Halo Wars 2, including leader builds, multiplayer strategies, and more.

videos.title: Ten Tips for Every Beginner!
videos.description: New to Halo Wars 2? Learn the basics with these ten essential tips to get you started on the battlefield!

halo-wars-1.title: Halo Wars 1 Guides
halo-wars-1.description: Dive into our guides for the original Halo Wars, covering campaign walkthroughs and strategies.

videos.title: Why is Arcadia City so DIFFICULT in Halo Wars?!
videos.description: Learn how to beat the most difficult mission in Halo Wars.
videos.imageSrc: img/HW-Guides/Why is Arcadia City so hard.jpg

aoe-2.title: Age of Empires II
aoe-2.description: Master the classic Age of Empires II with our guides on campaigns, civilizations, and strategies.

videos.title: Xbox Beginners Guide
videos.description: A comprehensive guide for new players to the world of Age of Empires II, covering civilizations, resources, and combat. This guide is for the Xbox version of the game.
videos.alt: A screenshot from Age of Empires II

videos.title: Xbox Advanced Guide
videos.description: An advanced guide for Xbox players in Age of Empires II.

aoe-4.title: Age of Empires IV
aoe-4.description: Explore guides for Age of Empires IV, including civilization overviews and competitive strategies.

videos.description: A comprehensive guide for new players to the world of Age of Empires IV, covering civilizations, resources, and combat. This guide is for the Xbox version of the game.

videos.title: Xbox Controller Guide
videos.description: A guide for using an Xbox controller in Age of Empires IV. This guide is for the Xbox version of the game.
